@package hs-tendermint-client
@version 0.1.0.0

module Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient

-- | JSON-RPC request.
data Request
Request :: !MethodName -> !Int -> !Value -> Request
[requestMethod] :: Request -> !MethodName
[requestId] :: Request -> !Int
[requestParams] :: Request -> !Value

-- | JSON-RPC response.
data Response
Response :: !Int -> !Either RpcError Value -> Response
[responseId] :: Response -> !Int
[responseResult] :: Response -> !Either RpcError Value

-- | JSON-RPC error message
data RpcError
RpcError :: !Int -> !Text -> !Maybe Value -> RpcError
[errCode] :: RpcError -> !Int
[errMessage] :: RpcError -> !Text
[errData] :: RpcError -> !Maybe Value
data JsonRpcException
ParsingException :: String -> JsonRpcException
CallException :: RpcError -> JsonRpcException

-- | Name of called method.
newtype MethodName
MethodName :: Text -> MethodName

-- | JSON-RPC client config
data Config
Config :: Request -> (Request -> IO ()) -> (Response -> IO ()) -> Config

-- | A base request used for all JSON RPC requests
[cBaseHTTPRequest] :: Config -> Request

-- | An acion to perform before sending the <a>Request</a>
[withRequest] :: Config -> Request -> IO ()

-- | An acion to perform before handling the <a>Response</a>
[withResponse] :: Config -> Response -> IO ()
remote :: (MonadIO m, MonadReader Config m, FromJSON output, ToJSON input) => MethodName -> input -> m output
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.MethodName
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.MethodName
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.MethodName
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.JsonRpcException
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.JsonRpcException
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.Response
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.Response
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.RpcError
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.Request
instance GHC.Exception.Type.Exception Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.JsonRpcException
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.Response
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.Response
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.RpcError
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.RpcError
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.Tendermint.Client.Internal.RPCClient.RpcError

module Network.Tendermint.Client
data SignedMsgType
PrevoteType :: SignedMsgType
PrecommitType :: SignedMsgType
ProposalType :: SignedMsgType
type Tx = Base64String
data Vote
Vote :: SignedMsgType -> WrappedVal Int64 -> WrappedVal Int -> BlockID -> Timestamp -> HexString -> WrappedVal Int -> Tx -> Vote
[voteType] :: Vote -> SignedMsgType
[voteHeight] :: Vote -> WrappedVal Int64
[voteRound] :: Vote -> WrappedVal Int
[voteBlockId] :: Vote -> BlockID
[voteTimestamp] :: Vote -> Timestamp
[voteValidatorAddress] :: Vote -> HexString
[voteValidatorIndex] :: Vote -> WrappedVal Int
[voteSignature] :: Vote -> Tx
data Commit
Commit :: BlockID -> [Vote] -> Commit
[commitBlockId] :: Commit -> BlockID
[commitPrecommits] :: Commit -> [Vote]
type EvidenceList = WrappedVal [Evidence]
data EvidenceData
EvidenceData :: EvidenceList -> EvidenceData
[evidenceDataEvidence] :: EvidenceData -> EvidenceList
data Data
Data :: WrappedVal [Tx] -> Data
[dataTxs] :: Data -> WrappedVal [Tx]
data Block
Block :: Header -> Data -> EvidenceData -> Maybe Commit -> Block
[blockHeader] :: Block -> Header
[blockData] :: Block -> Data
[blockEvidence] :: Block -> EvidenceData
[blockLastCommit] :: Block -> Maybe Commit
data BlockMeta
BlockMeta :: BlockID -> Header -> BlockMeta
[blockMetaBlockId] :: BlockMeta -> BlockID
[blockMetaHeader] :: BlockMeta -> Header
data SimpleProof
SimpleProof :: WrappedVal Int64 -> WrappedVal Int64 -> Tx -> [Tx] -> SimpleProof
[simpleProofTotal] :: SimpleProof -> WrappedVal Int64
[simpleProofIndex] :: SimpleProof -> WrappedVal Int64
[simpleProofLeafHash] :: SimpleProof -> Tx
[simpleProofAunts] :: SimpleProof -> [Tx]
data TxProof
TxProof :: HexString -> Tx -> SimpleProof -> TxProof
[txProofRootHash] :: TxProof -> HexString
[txProofData] :: TxProof -> Tx
[txProofProof] :: TxProof -> SimpleProof
data ResultBroadcastTx
ResultBroadcastTx :: Word32 -> HexString -> Text -> HexString -> ResultBroadcastTx
[resultBroadcastTxCode] :: ResultBroadcastTx -> Word32
[resultBroadcastTxData] :: ResultBroadcastTx -> HexString
[resultBroadcastTxLog] :: ResultBroadcastTx -> Text
[resultBroadcastTxHash] :: ResultBroadcastTx -> HexString
data ResultABCIInfo
ResultABCIInfo :: Info -> ResultABCIInfo
[resultABCIInfoResponse] :: ResultABCIInfo -> Info
data ResultHealth
ResultHealth :: ResultHealth
data ResultBroadcastTxCommit
ResultBroadcastTxCommit :: CheckTx -> DeliverTx -> HexString -> WrappedVal Int64 -> ResultBroadcastTxCommit
[resultBroadcastTxCommitCheckTx] :: ResultBroadcastTxCommit -> CheckTx
[resultBroadcastTxCommitDeliverTx] :: ResultBroadcastTxCommit -> DeliverTx
[resultBroadcastTxCommitHash] :: ResultBroadcastTxCommit -> HexString
[resultBroadcastTxCommitHeight] :: ResultBroadcastTxCommit -> WrappedVal Int64
data RequestBroadcastTxCommit
RequestBroadcastTxCommit :: Tx -> RequestBroadcastTxCommit
[requestBroadcastTxCommitTx] :: RequestBroadcastTxCommit -> Tx
data RequestBroadcastTxSync
RequestBroadcastTxSync :: Tx -> RequestBroadcastTxSync
[requestBroadcastTxSyncTx] :: RequestBroadcastTxSync -> Tx
data RequestBroadcastTxAsync
RequestBroadcastTxAsync :: Tx -> RequestBroadcastTxAsync
[requestBroadcastTxAsyncTx] :: RequestBroadcastTxAsync -> Tx
data ResultTx
ResultTx :: HexString -> WrappedVal Int64 -> Word32 -> DeliverTx -> Tx -> Maybe TxProof -> ResultTx
[resultTxHash] :: ResultTx -> HexString
[resultTxHeight] :: ResultTx -> WrappedVal Int64
[resultTxIndex] :: ResultTx -> Word32
[resultTxTxResult] :: ResultTx -> DeliverTx
[resultTxTx] :: ResultTx -> Tx
[resultTxProof] :: ResultTx -> Maybe TxProof
data RequestTx
RequestTx :: Maybe Tx -> Bool -> RequestTx
[requestTxHash] :: RequestTx -> Maybe Tx
[requestTxProve] :: RequestTx -> Bool
data ResultBlock
ResultBlock :: BlockMeta -> Block -> ResultBlock
[resultBlockBlockMeta] :: ResultBlock -> BlockMeta
[resultBlockBlock] :: ResultBlock -> Block
data RequestBlock
RequestBlock :: Maybe (WrappedVal Int64) -> RequestBlock
[requestBlockHeightPtr] :: RequestBlock -> Maybe (WrappedVal Int64)
data ResultABCIQuery
ResultABCIQuery :: Query -> ResultABCIQuery
[resultABCIQueryResponse] :: ResultABCIQuery -> Query
data RequestABCIQuery
RequestABCIQuery :: Maybe Text -> HexString -> Maybe (WrappedVal Int64) -> Bool -> RequestABCIQuery
[requestABCIQueryPath] :: RequestABCIQuery -> Maybe Text
[requestABCIQueryData] :: RequestABCIQuery -> HexString
[requestABCIQueryHeight] :: RequestABCIQuery -> Maybe (WrappedVal Int64)
[requestABCIQueryProve] :: RequestABCIQuery -> Bool
type TendermintM = ReaderT Config IO

-- | Execute an RPC request with the given configuration.
runTendermintM :: Config -> TendermintM a -> IO a
defaultConfig :: ByteString -> Int -> Config

-- | invokes <a>/abci_query</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/abci.go#L56</a>
abciQuery :: RequestABCIQuery -> TendermintM ResultABCIQuery

-- | invokes <a>/block</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/blocks.go#L72</a>
block :: RequestBlock -> TendermintM ResultBlock

-- | invokes <a>/tx</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/tx.go#L81</a>
tx :: RequestTx -> TendermintM ResultTx

-- | invokes <a>/broadcast_tx_async</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/mempool.go#L75</a>
broadcastTxAsync :: RequestBroadcastTxAsync -> TendermintM ResultBroadcastTx

-- | invokes <a>/broadcast_tx_sync</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/mempool.go#L136</a>
broadcastTxSync :: RequestBroadcastTxSync -> TendermintM ResultBroadcastTx

-- | invokes <a>/broadcast_tx_commit</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/mempool.go#L215</a>
broadcastTxCommit :: RequestBroadcastTxCommit -> TendermintM ResultBroadcastTxCommit

-- | invokes <a>/health</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/health.go#L35</a>
health :: TendermintM ResultHealth

-- | invokes <a>/abci_info</a> rpc call
--   <a>https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/v0.32.2/rpc/core/abci.go#L100</a>
abciInfo :: TendermintM ResultABCIInfo
defaultRPCOptions :: String -> Options

-- | JSON-RPC client config
data Config
Config :: Request -> (Request -> IO ()) -> (Response -> IO ()) -> Config

-- | A base request used for all JSON RPC requests
[cBaseHTTPRequest] :: Config -> Request

-- | An acion to perform before sending the <a>Request</a>
[withRequest] :: Config -> Request -> IO ()

-- | An acion to perform before handling the <a>Response</a>
[withResponse] :: Config -> Response -> IO ()
data JsonRpcException
ParsingException :: String -> JsonRpcException
CallException :: RpcError -> JsonRpcException

-- | JSON-RPC error message
data RpcError

[errCode] :: RpcError -> !Int
